name: Base de Données Archéologique
m49_region: Northern Europe; Western Europe; Southern Europe; Western Asia; Northern Africa

name: ANDES 14C
remarks: Described in 1994; unclear when first made available online.

name: Canadian Archaeological Radiocarbon Database
remarks: Access to some data is restricted. Incorporates AustArch and Radiocarbon Paleolithic European Database v18.

name: RADO.NB (incl. RADON and RADON-B)
m49_region: Northern Europe; Western Europe; Southern Europe; Eastern Europe
remarks: RADO.NB (2024) is a continuation of RADON (1999) and RADON-B (2013)

name: International Central Anatolian Neolithic e-Workshop databases
remarks: Defunct 2010; continued as 14SEA (2015). Number of dates approximate.

name: Radiocarbon Palaeolithic Europe Database
m49_region: Northern Europe; Western Europe; Southern Europe; Eastern Europe

name: CalPal database
remarks: Main database only accessible via the CalPal software, but a version is mirrored on GitHub (last updated 2020): https://github.com/nevrome/CalPal-Database

name: CONTEXT
remarks: Website no longer functional, but copies exist. Open access but non-open license.

name: AustArch (1, 2, and 3)
license: ADS Terms of Use and Access
remarks: Also includes non-radiocarbon dates

name: Irish Radiocarbon & Dendrochronological Dates
remarks: Archived version of the website has the release history: http://web.archive.org/web/20111122220757/https://sites.google.com/site/chapplearchaeology/irish-radiocarbon-dendrochronological-dates/

name: PACEA Geo-Referenced Radiocarbon Database

name: 14SEA
remarks: Continuation of CANEW (2001)

name: Archive des datations radiocarbones d’Afrique centrale
Palmisano et al. 2017
remarks: Included in the R package rcarbon as ‘emedyd’

name: Database of Radiocarbon Dates Published in Japanese Archaeological Reports
A repository of radiocarbon data for Rapa Nui
Mesoamerican Radiocarbon Database (MesoRAD)
remarks: Registration required for access

name: Crema & Kobayashi 2020
remarks: Included in the R package rcarbon as ‘jomon’

name: caribbean-14C
remarks: Based on Napolitano et al. 2019

name: Aotearoa New Zealand Radiocarbon Databas
remarks: No machine-readable access

name: Hoebe et al. 2023
remarks: Open access but under a non-open license (CC BY-NC-ND)

name: An Annotated Compilation of Chronometric Dates for the Middle-Upper Palaeolithic Transition (45-30 ka BP) in Northern Iberia (Spain)
Datations absolues, Inventaires archéologiques et Bibliographies en Afrique Centrale
Banque Nationale de Données Radiocarbone pour l'Europe et le Proche Orient
m49_region: Northern Europe; Western Europe; Southern Europe; Western Asia
remarks: Accessible online but only through a search box (no browsing)

name: NERC Radiocarbon Facility
remarks: The NERC Radiocarbon Facility no longer exists in that form, so unclear whether this is maintained.

name: Abu Dhabi Islands Archaeological Survey Radiocarbon Database
remarks: Less than 100 dates

name: Archivo de Dataciones Radiocarbónicas de la Prehistoria Recient (IDEARQ)
remarks: Accessible online but no machine-readable index of all dates and non-open license (CC BY-NC-SA)

name: Royal Institute for Cultural Heritage web based Radiocarbon database
